body.name: Dash Cam Front and Rear, 4K Single Front Dash Camera, 2K/1080P Dual Car Camera for Cars, Built-in Wi-Fi,1.5” IPS Display Mini Dashcam,Night Vision,Voice Control,24H Parking Mode,G-Sensor,P1 Duo
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 1 hr 36 mins
features: 4K Single Front Camera Mode: (When disconnecting the rear camera)With an advanced sensor and 160° wide-angle lens, the dashcam records crystal clear videos at 3840*2160P/30fps, ensuring you have high-quality evidence in case of an accident

2K + 1080P Dual Recording Mode: P1 Duo dash cam features both front and rear cameras that simultaneously capture crystal-clear footage in 2K 1440P and 1080P. With wide angles of 160 degrees in the front and 150 degrees in the rear, you won't miss a single detail of your drive, helping provide crucial evidence in the event of an accident

Excellent Night Vision: With a 1.5/F aperture and 6 layers, the car camera captures every detail, from license plates to road signs, even in low-light conditions and utilizes advanced image processing technology to minimize glare distortion caused by daylight or vehicles behind you

Built-in WiFi & APP Control: Enjoy real-time preview of your video and easily share your travel moments with friends and family. With fast WiFi and a dedicated "Pelsee Cam" app, you can download, view, playback, and edit footage right from your smartphone. Connect easily and start recording!

Hands-Free Voice Control: Effortlessly control the dash cam front and rear with spoken commands, allowing you to focus on driving for safety. Simply speak to turn on or off recording audio, take photos and lock video

24-Hour Parking Mode: The dash camera automatically switches to Parking Mode when your car is parked, providing continuous surveillance and protection. Time-lapse Recording condenses every 30 minutes of video, helping save power and storage space. An extra ACC hardwire kit is needed for this function

Loop Recording/G-sensor: the car dash cam automatically overwrites the oldest files, ensuring continuous recording even when the card reaches full capacity; G-sensor detects sudden collisions or impacts, instantly locking the corresponding footage from being overwritten

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dashcam At An Excellent Price. Definatly Worth Getting!
reviews.reviewText: We live in So. FL where traffic is high and drivers... well, let's just say they drive erratically. I had an older device in my wife's vehicle that seemed to have a bad power source wiring causing the camera to glitch and constantly restart. I labored at what to buy and did hours of research and narrowed my choice down to Pelsee, a brand I've come to admire. As video attachment examples cause large file sizes (not my thing to deal with uploading ) I settled for images but trust me, the playback on one's phone or PC, the resolutions are very crisp and detailed indeed. It's 2K/1080P is really all you need in this fine camera. Honestly.Every manufacturer brags about theirs being able to clearly read license plates but not all do as I've owned 2 different brands before and it was debatable. Pelsee however does and exceptionally well! I guess I was looking something unobtrusive and user-friendly with not too many buttons for my wife to have to press or complicated menus. Don't get me wrong, this is NOT an entry level camera, but rather a slick, modern, and quite sophisticated device, which I wish I knew existed and bought before. It is absolutely a delight for my wife to use... Plug and play. Upon engine start it announces it is recording and does it's job. It sits right in front of the rear view mirror and one thing she insisted on was that it not be distracting. The samll footprint is hardly noticeable but a must-have. It can turn off the LCD screen but since I drive the vehicle too, I like to see it.A magnificent feature is the ability to pair one's BT phone and see not just recorded files, but real time if you want to put your phone in a holder and view it. A feature request I might add is if the phone app could pinch to zoom but you can always increase the magnification if the file is downloaded to a PC. The device does not get hot which I am pleasantly surprised with given the narrow size. Any heat disipates almost immediately. It feels solidly made, qualitative and if my wife is happy, so am I! Thank you Pelsee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for car!
reviews.reviewText: The packaging is very good. When I opened it, I could feel that this is a product with good quality. The instructions are very detailed, the installation is very simple, and the shape is very beautiful. Because we drive every day, it is necessary to install a front-facing camera. It's compact, convenient, and the picture quality is excellent. I will recommend it to my other friends. It's very cost-effective! Good price and perfect quality!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 4K Single Front Dash Camera, 2K/1080P Dual Car Camera
reviews.reviewText: I bought this Pelsee dash cam to replace my 3-year-old dash camera. I looked around and compared all the futures of many dash cams, and eventually I picked this one. After I received it and tested the product, I was so surprised that the quality was higher than I expected. The front camera image is crystal clear, and the back camera is very good as well. Installation is a piece of cake; it only took me about 15 minutes to get it done. Night vision is acceptable, the simple smart voice control works great, and you don’t have to push the dash cam button to take a photo, stop, start recording, or lock the video. Overall, excellent dash cam for this price range.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: "My experience with this dashcam has been nothing short of exceptional, and I'm delighted to share my positive feedback. From its sleek design to its advanced features, this device has truly proven its worth on the road.First and foremost, the video quality is outstanding. The dashcam captures crystal-clear footage, providing a detailed record of my journeys. The wide-angle lens ensures that it captures a comprehensive view of the surroundings, offering both security and peace of mind.The built-in GPS functionality adds an extra layer of value. Not only does it accurately log my location, but it also records crucial data such as speed and time. This information has proven invaluable, especially in the event of any unforeseen incidents or accidents.The G-sensor technology is a standout feature, automatically detecting and saving footage in the event of sudden acceleration, braking, or collisions. This ensures that critical moments are securely stored, providing essential evidence if needed. The loop recording feature is seamless, efficiently managing storage space without requiring constant manual intervention.Setting up and using this dashcam is a breeze. The user-friendly interface and intuitive controls make navigating through the settings effortless. The inclusion of a dedicated mobile app further enhances the user experience, allowing for easy video playback, download, and sharing directly from my smartphone.In terms of durability, this dashcam has proven robust and reliable. It withstands varying weather conditions, and the build quality instills confidence in its long-term performance. The included mount securely holds the device in place, offering stability even during bumpy rides.I also appreciate the discreet design, seamlessly blending into the interior of my vehicle without being obtrusive. The compact size ensures that it doesn't obstruct my line of sight while driving.In conclusion, this dashcam has truly exceeded my expectations. It not only provides a sense of security on the road but also offers a wealth of features that enhance the overall driving experience. I highly recommend this product to anyone in search of a reliable, feature-rich dashcam that goes above and beyond in ensuring road safety and peace of mind."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Dashcam itself works fine, as expected. App interface works well and easy enough to setup and connect. However, the cigarette lighter plug works for the dashcam but not for a charger or something to plug into it, which is annoying since it takes up the only one I have in my car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comprehensive Coverage in 2K + 1080P: P1 Duo Dash Cam Delivers Crystal-Clear Front and Rear Footage!
reviews.reviewText: P1 Duo Dash Cam exceeded my expectations with its 4K single front camera mode, delivering impeccable clarity for evidence. The 2K + 1080P dual recording mode captures every detail, providing comprehensive coverage for both front and rear views. The exceptional night vision and built-in WiFi with easy app control enhance convenience, allowing seamless video management on the go. Hands-free voice control adds a layer of safety, and the 24-hour parking mode ensures continuous surveillance. With loop recording and G-sensor features, it's a reliable companion for any driver.

Pretty easy to install the front camera. Tool me about only 10 mins to set it up with enough accessories included. The app is pretty easy to use and access to the camera, and the video is much clearer on the app compare to the picture showing on the equipment screen. Fast response and easy to set up over all! Very good dash camera send worth the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Pulled the trigger on this dash cam about two weeks ago, and it's been a game-changer for my daily commute to work. The dual front and rear cameras capture crisp footage, and I love the flexibility to switch between 4K for the front and 2K/1080P combo. I've fitted both to my car. Whenever I need 4K, I unplug the rear camera. The hands-free voice control is a handy touch, making it easy to manage recordings without fumbling with buttons whilst driving. The built-in Wi-Fi and app control add a modern twist, letting me quickly access and share footage straight from my phone. The night vision is surprisingly sharp, and the 24-hour parking mode provides peace of mind. While the dash cam has impressed me in many aspects, one drawback I've noticed is the rather small 1.5-inch display. It's a bit on the compact side, making it a tad challenging to navigate settings or review footage directly on the device. However, the app control feature somewhat compensates for this limitation, allowing for more convenient management through a smartphone. Overall, it's a reliable, user-friendly dash cam that ticks all the right boxes.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great dash cam and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I got this camera for my husband and he loves it. Small camera with a lot of features. Rear camera , phone connectivity and ease of use.The quality of footage is great as well even in nighttime. And it's not too bulky so it doesn't take so much room on the windshield. And also shipping was fast. Very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really great qualityYou can tell from the moment when you open the box.Presented so wellVery easy to fit..Comes with everything you need.. would recommend that you buy a good quality sd card to go with itApp on phone is great. Again so very easy to useWould recommend this.Definitely worth the money.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good Dash Cam for new driver
reviews.reviewText: Good fit to new driver, easy to install the camera and connect to iPhone via wifi. Camera work impressive! High resolution camera recording shows on the app. Worth price to buy it!!!
